volunteer_experience.info: The Lighthouse Project is a youth initiative by Raindancer India that connects urban educated youth to children from under-resourced communities through one-on-one mentoring in a safe environment. I was a mentor to an under privileged kid. I taught life, social and communication skills to my mentee whereas I in a leadership role learnt to tackle situations while dealing with him.
